name: Springfinity
tagline: Infinie scrolling on your homescreen. A remake of Infiniboard for iOS 11-12

changelog.changes: Make it so there is no half-row of icons at the bottom of the screen when using the option Hide Behind Dock + Page Control
Fix compatibility issues with Cylinder (fully fixed) and ClassicFolders2 (functionality fixed, but visual bugs remain), improve how autorotation and dock hiding is handled
Fix vertical paging option not taking effect immediately
